synesketch.emotion
Class SynesthetiatorEmotion

java.lang.Object
  synesketch.Synesthetiator
      synesketch.emotion.SynesthetiatorEmotion

public class SynesthetiatorEmotion
extends Synesthetiator

Defines behavior for transfering textual affect information -- emotional manifestations recognised in text -- into visual output and notifying Processing applet (PApplet) about that new information.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Uros Krcadinac email: uros@krcadinac.com

Constructor Detail

SynesthetiatorEmotion

public SynesthetiatorEmotion(processing.core.PApplet parent)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
Class constructor that sets parent Processing applet (PApplet). Parent applet is to be notified about the text event -- the recognition of a current emotion in text.
